amendment.description: To require a report on the use of ground source heat pumps at Department of Defense facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1341 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1341 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Alexander. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To require a report on the use of ground source heat pumps at Department of Defense facilities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1341 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1341 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Alexander.
